name: Luck of the Wasteland
description:
There's a rogue AI out in the middle of the desert. Thirty years ago, it blew up the world. Now, it's time to take it out.

Make it through the apocalyptic wasteland towards your target, taking down mutants, robots, and weird in-betweens along the way. From each fight, gather more cards that will expand your abilities and make your deck stronger. Die, and it's back to the beginning.

And hurry. Those enemies don't like to wait while you plan your next move...

Submitted for Apocalypse Jam 2022.

Browser Version: https://rippersmith.itch.io/luck-of-the-wasteland-webgl
